sent.orig: Congratulation! You are an registered user.
He has received many letters in congratulation of his birthday.
sent.trans: 他收到许多祝贺他生日的信件。

sent.orig: He sent her a letter of congratulation on her passing the exam.
sent.trans: 他给她寄去了贺信，祝贺她通过了考试。

sent.orig: If you make it like this:tear down face and lip, make others laugh. congratulation, you succeed!
sent.trans: 你如果做到，撕破脸皮，读破嘴皮，让人笑破肚皮。恭喜你，你成功了！

sent.orig: Yancheng Education Bureau sent three congratulation letters in the last three years.
sent.trans: 市教育局连续三年发来贺信。
